get.description: Returns the usage data for a given metric (or method) of an application.

parameters.description: Your api key with 3scale
parameters.name: provider_key

parameters.description: id of the application.
parameters.name: application_id

parameters.description: System name of metric for which to get data.
parameters.name: metric_name

parameters.description: Time range start. Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS, examples: '2012-02-22', '2012-02-22 23:49:00'
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: Period, combined with since give the stats for the time range [since .. since + period]. It is required if until is not passed.
parameters.name: period

parameters.description: Time range end. Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
parameters.name: until

parameters.description: Granularity of the results. Each period has an associated granularity.
parameters.name: granularity

parameters.description: Timezone to do the calculations in.
parameters.name: timezone

parameters.description: Skip period over period calculations (defaults to true).
parameters.name: skip_change

get.description: Returns the usage data of a given metric (or method) of a service.

parameters.description: Your api key with 3scale
parameters.name: provider_key

parameters.description: id of the service.
parameters.name: service_id

parameters.description: System name of metric for which to get data.
parameters.name: metric_name

parameters.description: Time range start. Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS, examples: '2012-02-22', '2012-02-22 23:49:00'
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: Period, combined with since give the stats for the time range [since .. since + period]. It is required if until is not passed.
parameters.name: period

parameters.description: Time range end. Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
parameters.name: until

parameters.description: Granularity of the results. Each period has an associated granularity.
parameters.name: granularity

parameters.description: Timezone to do the calculations in.
parameters.name: timezone

parameters.description: Skip period over period calculations (defaults to true).
parameters.name: skip_change

get.description: Returns usage and application data for the top 10 most active applications of a service.

parameters.description: Your api key with 3scale
parameters.name: provider_key

parameters.description: id of the service.
parameters.name: service_id

parameters.description: Time range start. Format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS, examples: '2012-02-22', '2012-02-22 23:49:00'
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: Period, combined with since give the stats for the time range [since .. since + period]. It is required if until is not passed.
parameters.name: period

parameters.description: System name of metric for which to get data.
parameters.name: metric_name
